resources.string:
Brilliant connect is a voice calling app that you 
 can use to make calls to any mobile and land 
 phone number. App to app calls and 
 messaging are free

Brilliant Connects crystal clear voice quality 
 while making or receiving calls to/from 
 anywhere around the globe enables you to 
 stay close to your loved ones no matter 
 where you are

Install this app and get a unique Brilliant 
 Connect number. This number enables you to 
 receive calls from any mobile/landline number 
 from anywhere in the world
Brilliant Connect gives you the freedom to call \n any mobile or landline number in Bangladesh \n anytime at the lowest call rate

Brilliant connect is a voice calling app that you 
 can use to make calls to any mobile and land 
 phone number. App to app calls and 
 messaging are free.
Edit your profile info, which will be visible \n to your friends
To send and receive files and see your contacts profile \n pictures, allow Brilliant access to your device storage

We are going to ask your permission to sync your native 
 contacts with the app and temporarily load without 
 names into servers for Brilliant Connect contacts 
 matching. This is done for your convenience. you can 
 decline this permission and still use the app without sync /n and matching. Your contacts are not shared with any 3rd /n party and not used for any other purposes than listed 
 above. 
 You can learn more about our privacy policy here.
